main.name: Franco Mischuk
main.description: As a perfectionist my objective always was to be able to work for an encouraging and stable company that will assist me in developing, improving, and obtaining the necessary skills in order to become the best software developer possible.
main.bio: I am a restless person when it comes to working or improving as a professional, I always try to do my best and in the best way possible.

education.description: I started right after I finished technician school. At the same that I was studying here, I also was working as a technician at the local Casino. Here I improve my knowledge about the foundation that I learned on the school
Here I made my first steps on the programming world

work.title: Platform & Software Engineer
work.description: With a solid foundation in Software Development, I joined a platform Team in GlobalLogic, Since then I am developing templates for internal uses, I take interviews for potential new team members and help them with the onboarding on the platform.

work.title: Fullstack Developer
work.description: I joined Avalith team as a Full Stack Developer. Besides the projects that I was working on, I was in charge of the interviews and the training of the new company candidates.

work.title: Technician
work.description: I worked setting up the slot machines, from the hardware until the final software configuration.
